q_gender.text: What is the gender of the person receiving your gift?

q_relation_male.text: This is gonna be hard. Guys don't buy gifts for other guys. Why are you buying him a gift?

q_relation_female.text: Let's face it, you are in trouble. Why are you buying her a gift?

q_dad_prev_gift.text: What did you get him last holiday season?

q_dad_tie_count.text: How original... How many ties does he own now?

q_dad_handy.text: So Dad is pretty handy huh?

q_dad_mug_usage.text: And does he actually use this mug?

q_dad_almost_fire.text: Was he so excited to test out the new grill right away that almost started the house on fire?

q_bullied.text: So you probably picked on him when you were growing up?

q_bullied_you.text: So he probably picked on you when you were growing up?

q_uncle_seen.text: Ah yes, Crazy Uncle Charlie... When was the last time you saw him?

q_buy_clothes.text: That's unfortunate, but she'll come around. Have you considered buying her clothes?

q_her_size.text: Really? You should know by now that no woman actually wants a man picking out her clothes. Do you even know her size?

q_really_wants.text: What does she really want for the holidays?

q_sister_spoiled.text: Was she spoiled as a child?

q_know_anything.text: Do you know anything about this person?

q_mil_cake.text: Have you ever actually tried fruitcake? Nobody likes that stuff.

q_mil_plaque.text: As if she doesn't already have enough of those...

q_mil_sweater.text: We both know how much you hate hand-knit sweaters. And lap dogs. And dogs in human clothes.

q_mil_poster.text: Do you really want to endure the strange looks you will get when you buy this?

answers.val_mug: A mug that says World's #1 Dad
answers.val_yes_embarrassing: Yes, that's the problem. He takes it everywhere and it's super embarrassing.
answers.val_yes_exactly: Yes, that is exactly what happened.
answers.val_yes_pony: Got everything she ever wanted. One Christmas, she got a pony. The best thing I got that year was a pack of new socks.
answers.val_no_worse_fix: No, he just thinks he is. In reality he just ends up making things worse when he tries to fix them.
answers.val_no_why_bother: No, I don't know why I even bother getting him gifts if he's not going to use them anyway.
answers.val_no_actually: No... he actually did start the house on fire.
answers.val_last_christmas: Last Christmas - He drank too much eggnog ans passed out on the couch while watching basketball.
answers.val_thanksgiving: A couple of weeks ago at Thanksgiving - He ate too much turkey and passed out on the couch while watching football.
answers.val_last_week: Last Week when he invited himself over then passed out on the couch while watching 'Scandal'.
answers.val_sure: Sure. I'm a size 36 so she's probably like a 32.
answers.val_no_sports: She's not really in to sports.
answers.val_plaque: A 'Home is Where the Heart is' Plaque
answers.val_sweater: Hand-knit sweater for her lap dog
answers.val_poster: One of those creepy posters where the kids are dressed up like adults
answers.val_cat: I think she has a cat.
answers.val_hat: Nope. Drew her name out of a hat for Secret Santa.
answers.val_fresh: Time to start fresh. 'Tis the season for giving and forgiving!
answers.val_forget_wants: For just a minute, forget about what she wants...
answers.val_keep_thinking: You'd better keep thinking... She's still mad at you for ruining Christmas last year.

reasons.rsn_skip_ties: I think you can skip a year of the ties. How about this year you get him a gift that won't end up thrown in the back of the closet? Like %s.
reasons.rsn_month_ties: I know you are worried that Dad needs another tie, but if he can go an entire month without wearing the same tie twice I think he is ok on ties. Let's go with %s this year.
reasons.rsn_has_tools: Then he already has all the tools he needs. Get him %s this year.
reasons.rsn_stop_enabling: Stop enabling this behavior and get him %s this year.
reasons.rsn_break_mug: Here's what you do: 'accidentally' drop the mug and get him %s to make up for your clumsiness.
reasons.rsn_gift_he_uses: Then get him a gift he will actually use... Like %s.
reasons.rsn_fire_hazard: For the rest of the family's safety you need to get him a gift that is not a fire hazard... Like %s.
reasons.rsn_amends_bullying: Show him how much you've grown and make amends for your adolescent bullying by getting him %s.
reasons.rsn_best_brother: You are the best older brother ever! You have probably already bought him multiple %ss.
reasons.rsn_superiority: Here's what you do: Get him %s, then get yourself a 10-Pack and passive-aggressively demonstrate your newfound superiority.
reasons.rsn_best_older_brother: You have the best older brother ever! Get a pair of %s and enjoy some quality time with this great guy.
reasons.rsn_get_off_couch: Get him %s and get him off your couch!
reasons.rsn_no_need: No need to buy this person a gift. Take the money you would have spent and put it towards %s.
reasons.rsn_out_of_office: Get him %s consisting of 4 weekday, day games and enjoy the extra time he is out of the office.
reasons.rsn_redeem_yourself: Face it, you'll never be good enough for his daughter. Your best chance of redeeming yourself would be to get him %s.
reasons.rsn_true_life_partner: You have found yourself a true life partner. Get her %s as a sign of your gratitude.
reasons.rsn_girl_chance: Nice, Bro! Get her %s to make sure you don't screw this up.
reasons.rsn_soften_blow: Dump her. But first give her %s to soften the blow.
reasons.rsn_oh_boy: Oh boy, just get her %s. Trust us, you'll thank us later.
reasons.rsn_experiment: Time to pull the plug on this little experiment and just get her %s.
reasons.rsn_free_weekends: Good decision. You know your limitations. Get her %s and spend your next few weekends watching college football instead of braving shopping malls only to get her a shirt she will return anyway.
reasons.rsn_favorite_child: Obviously you got your brains from your mother. Earn the title of 'favorite child' by getting her %s.
reasons.rsn_miller_park: Well that was easy... Get her %s. She can enjoy all of those things at Miller Park.
reasons.rsn_free_ornament: Perfect! You get a free Bernie Brewer with every pair of %s.
reasons.rsn_forget_ashamed: For just a minute, forget about what she wants... and get her %s.
reasons.rsn_changed_diapers: The woman probably changed your diapers when you were a baby. You owe her BIG TIME. Get her %s.
reasons.rsn_face_light_up: You know you can't wait to see her face light up when she opens that %s. Just think of the memories you'll make.
reasons.rsn_safer_toy: You could get her a cat toy... Of course, then she will know that you think she is the crazy cat lady. %s is safer.
reasons.rsn_never_wrong: Get her %s. You can never go wrong with that.
reasons.rsn_ah_ha: AH HA! Get her a gift you will not be ashamed to buy - like %s.
